channel.title: Are you struggling to learn Java? Click here
channel.description:
[center] This is technically a tutorial, only it in the files as I teach you Java. (Java is commonly used to code what you play, private servers. So this should technically be the correct section)
Okay, so as I know, many of you are struggling to learn Java code. I have 2 notepad packages at my disposal for you guys to have, it just lists through what private,public and blah blah for loops while loops arrays, how arrays work etc.
When I was studying Java/Javascript I noted everything down. So this is why I'm going to release them to the community.
Also for the dumb fucks who are going to say a note file is a virus... Heres a pic:
[IMG]http://img412.imageshack.us/img412/1599/picfornotesrelease.png[/img]
Package 1: This package contains just the general knowledge that a beginner wouldn't just know. So if you are literally only just starting download this one first:
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12213315/LimbosJava1Package.zip
Package 2: Well, I started scripting for PowerBot (RsBot.org) and I noted this one down around a year ago. So if you want to learn a little about making bots for runescape click this one(To actually make a script you may need package 1 first):
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12213315/LimbosJavascript2%28powerbot%29package.zip
Enjoy.[/center]

item.title: Are you struggling to learn Java? Click here
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

If you’re going to try to teach someone something, do so using correct conventions so you don’t teach bad habits. Also, this section is for tutorials related to RuneScape private servers, not Java in general.

Read full topic
item.source: Are you struggling to learn Java? Click here
